rules_text: When Harbor Trawler enters the battlefield, you may tap two other untapped artifacts and/or creatures you control. When you do, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
notes:
WU:
 - five or more artifacts
 - metalcraft
UB:
 - even MV only
 - Zombies
GU:
 - five or more alternate costs
 - fathom
UR:
 - all fliers
 - drakes/dragons
